text: Seniors, workers with disabilities and Veterans who rely on Social Security benefits use them on prescription medications, food and housing. Today’s COLA increase does not reflect the real cost they carry. I oppose any Social Security cuts and am fighting to #ExpandSocialSecurity

When I was growing up, school lunch was sometimes the only meal I could count on. That’s still a reality for too many young people in America. This #NationalSchoolLunchWeek, let’s do our part to ensure everyone in our communities has access to healthy and nutritious meals.

#VaccinesWork. They save lives and give children around the world a @ShotAtLife, which is why polio cases have been reduced by 99.9% globally in just 20 years—from 350k/yr to just 22 in 2017. We still have work to do, so this #WorldPolioDay let’s work to #EndPolio.
